longBusinessSummary: The fund normally invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus any borrowings for investment purposes) in equity securities of medium-sized companies with significant capital appreciation potential. For the fund, "medium-sized companies" are those with market capitalizations within the collective market capitalization range of companies represented in either the Russell Mid Cap Index or the S&P Mid Cap 400 Index. It may invest up to 25% of its total assets in foreign securities, including emerging market securities.
